version_description:
color buttons now in better places
Form->Ray,
Preset->Grids
New eschers
Please if you run iOS 9.0 move to 9.1 as it has many new fixes for the app,...

color buttons now in better places
Form->Ray,
Preset->Grids
New eschers
Please if you run iOS 9.0 move to 9.1 as it has many new fixes for the app,...
- new grids
- new grids

enable the old devices like 4s and 5c, no other changes.
recording is back

enable the old devices like 4s and 5c, no other changes.
recording is back

- Brush->Clone
- Textures now organised, Texture->Leaks
- Adjust->EQ2
- Fixes in Auto2, Water and WaterB
- Style->Flat3, 4
- Style-> Coherence4
- Effects->Range

- Brush->Clone
- Textures now organised, Texture->Leaks
- Adjust->EQ2
- Fixes in Auto2, Water and WaterB
- Style->Flat3, 4
- Style-> Coherence4
- Effects->Range
3 new Grids, 8 flats, one new preset in: tile, raise, tonelab#5, blur, hatch, painterly#5 (test it with water), edges#5 & #7, mirror and a new vibrance that protects skin.
3 new Grids, 8 flats, one new preset in: tile, raise, tonelab#5, blur, hatch, painterly#5 (test it with water), edges#5 & #7, mirror and a new vibrance that protects skin.
Todays widget, flat 2, better LUT table
Todays widget, flat 2, better LUT table
fixes flat #20, tensor #5..better recording for 5s or newer..(you have to enable in Settings app)
fixes flat #20, tensor #5..better recording for 5s or newer..(you have to enable in Settings app)
Styles -> ETFlow
Styles -> ETFlow

- New brush picker: You can add/remove favorites, order by dragging the brushes (groups)
- Integration with a new app for creating brushes from images : iC Brushes (search in the App Store)

- New brush picker: You can add/remove favorites, order by dragging the brushes (groups)
- Integration with a new app for creating brushes from images : iC Brushes (search in the App Store)
Fixes a problem with Bristle brush
Fixes a problem with Bristle brush
- Fixes some crashes in lighten effect.
- Fixes some crashes in lighten effect.

Solves a problem when importing iC Brushes groups with an existing name
Don't miss the tutorials at http://photo2paint.com

Solves a problem when importing iC Brushes groups with an existing name
Don't miss the tutorials at http://photo2paint.com

- New ETFlow preset 2
- New options in Sketch preset 4 (set button) and Tensor presets 4 and 5
- New Match 2,3,4,5 presets.

- New ETFlow preset 2
- New options in Sketch preset 4 (set button) and Tensor presets 4 and 5
- New Match 2,3,4,5 presets.
Fixes a problem with Match buttons.
Fixes a problem with Match buttons.
